testprocedure.test-case-summary: This test procedure is called by a test case and is used to verify the SUTs support of the dlIntersectionSignalTimingPatternInventorySubscription dialog as an OC using variables provided by the calling test case. This procedure supports verification of requirements related to user need 2.3.5.10.8 [Need to Share Controller Timing Patterns] and is used for both valid and invalid test cases.

testStep.functionId: Step 1 CONFIGURE: Determine the Application Layer Standard that will be used for this test. RECORD this information as: ApplicationLayerStandard: ${ApplicationLayerStandard}

Step 2 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Restrictions - Timing Pattern is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.7.5.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N93R1034_Restrictions___Timing_Pattern_Supported = ${TMDD_N93R1034_Restrictions___Timing_Pattern_Supported}

Step 3 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Description of Timing Pattern is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.7.5.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N93R1035_Description_of_Timing_Pattern_Supported = ${TMDD_N93R1035_Description_of_Timing_Pattern_Supported}

Step 4 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Maximum Green Duration is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.7.5.2.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N93R1036_Maximum_Green_Duration_Supported = ${TMDD_N93R1036_Maximum_Green_Duration_Supported}

Step 5 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Minimum Green Duration is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.7.5.2.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N93R1037_Minimum_Green_Duration_Supported = ${TMDD_N93R1037_Minimum_Green_Duration_Supported}

Step 6 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Vehicle Clearance Duration is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.7.5.2.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N93R1038_Vehicle_Clearance_Duration_Supported = ${TMDD_N93R1038_Vehicle_Clearance_Duration_Supported}

Step 7 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Vehicle Red Duration is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.7.5.2.6). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N93R1039_Vehicle_Red_Duration_Supported = ${TMDD_N93R1039_Vehicle_Red_Duration_Supported}

Step 8 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Minimum Walk Duration is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.7.5.2.7). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N93R1040_Minimum_Walk_Duration_Supported = ${TMDD_N93R1040_Minimum_Walk_Duration_Supported}

Step 9 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Pedestrian Clearance Duration is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.7.5.2.8). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N93R1041_Pedestrian_Clearance_Duration_Supported = ${TMDD_N93R1041_Pedestrian_Clearance_Duration_Supported}

Step 10 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Steady-dont-walk Duration is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.7.5.2.9). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N93R1042_Steady_dont_walk_Duration_Supported = ${TMDD_N93R1042_Steady_dont_walk_Duration_Supported}

Step 11 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Phase Sequence Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.7.5.2.10). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N93R1043_Phase_Sequence_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N93R1043_Phase_Sequence_Information_Supported}

Step 12 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Timing Pattern Inventory Date and Time Change Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.7.5.2.11). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N93R1044_Timing_Pattern_Inventory_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N93R1044_Timing_Pattern_Inventory_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported}
Step 13 CONFIGURE: Determine the number of publication message transmissions that will be received within this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationsToReceive: ${PublicationsToReceive}
Step 14 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationErrorResponseExpected: ${PublicationErrorResponseExpected}

Step 15 CONFIGURE: IF PublicationErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationErrorTypeExpected: ${PublicationErrorTypeExpected}
Step 16 CONFIGURE: Define the publication response message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: PublicationResponseMessage: ${PublicationResponseMessage}
Step 17 CONFIGURE: Determine whether the Authentication parameters need to be verified within this test. RECORD this information as: AuthenticationCheck: ${AuthenticationCheck}
Step 18 CONFIGURE: Determine whether the SUT will be allowed access to the information requested in this test. RECORD this information as: AllowAccess: ${AllowAccess}
Step 19 CONFIGURE: Define the publication message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionMessage: ${SubscriptionMessage}
Step 20 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected: ${SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected}

Step 21 CONFIGURE: IF SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected: ${SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected}

Step 22 SUBSCRIPTION-EC with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlIntersectionSignalTimingPatternInventorySubscription SUBSCRIPTIONMESSAGE = SubscriptionMessage SUBSCRIPTIONERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected SUBSCRIPTIONERRORTYPEEXPECTED = SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected Returns: CONTINUEPUBLICATION
Step 23 IF SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 23.1 WHILE CONTINUEPUBLICATION is equal to TRUE then CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 23.1.1 PUBLICATION-EC-RECEIVE with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlIntersectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryUpdate RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED=TMDD_N93R1027_Publish_Signal_Timing_Pattern_Information_Parameter PUBLICATIONSTORECEIVE = PublicationsToReceive PUBLICATIONERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = PublicationErrorResponseExpected PUBLICATIONERRORTYPEEXPECTED = PublicationErrorTypeExpected AUTHENTICATIONCHECK = AuthenticationCheck ALLOWACCESS = AllowAccess Returns: CONTINUEPUBLICATION
Step 23.1.2 IF PublicationErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 23.1.2.1 VERIFY that element intersectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg exists.
Step 23.1.2.2 VERIFY that element organization-information exists within each instance of intersectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.intersection-signal-timing-pattern-inventory-item
Step 23.1.2.3 VERIFY that element device-id exists within each instance of intersectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.intersection-signal-timing-pattern-inventory-item
Step 23.1.2.4 VERIFY that element timing-pattern-id exists within each instance of intersectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.intersection-signal-timing-pattern-inventory-item
Step 23.1.2.5 VERIFY that element cycle-length exists within each instance of intersectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.intersection-signal-timing-pattern-inventory-item
Step 23.1.2.6 VERIFY that element offset-time exists within each instance of intersectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.intersection-signal-timing-pattern-inventory-item
Step 23.1.2.7 VERIFY that element phase-identifier exists within each instance of intersectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.intersection-signal-timing-pattern-inventory-item.phase-tp-list.phases
Step 23.1.2.8 VERIFY that element coordinated-phase exists within each instance of intersectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.intersection-signal-timing-pattern-inventory-item.phase-tp-list.phases
Step 23.1.2.9 VERIFY that element split-mode exists within each instance of intersectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.intersection-signal-timing-pattern-inventory-item.phase-tp-list.phases
Step 23.1.2.10 VERIFY that element phase-split exists within each instance of intersectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.intersection-signal-timing-pattern-inventory-item.phase-tp-list.phases
Step 23.1.2.11 IF TMDD_N93R1034_Restrictions___Timing_Pattern_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 23.1.2.11.1 VERIFY that element restrictions exists within each instance of intersectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.intersection-signal-timing-pattern-inventory-item
Step 23.1.2.12 IF TMDD_N93R1035_Description_of_Timing_Pattern_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 23.1.2.12.1 VERIFY that element timing-pattern-name exists within each instance of intersectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.intersection-signal-timing-pattern-inventory-item
Step 23.1.2.13 IF TMDD_N93R1036_Maximum_Green_Duration_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 23.1.2.13.1 VERIFY that element maximum-green-duration exists within each instance of intersectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.intersection-signal-timing-pattern-inventory-item.phase-tp-list.phases
Step 23.1.2.14 IF TMDD_N93R1037_Minimum_Green_Duration_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 23.1.2.14.1 VERIFY that element minimum-green-duration exists within each instance of intersectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.intersection-signal-timing-pattern-inventory-item.phase-tp-list.phases
Step 23.1.2.15 IF TMDD_N93R1038_Vehicle_Clearance_Duration_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 23.1.2.15.1 VERIFY that element vehicle-clearance-duration exists within each instance of intersectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.intersection-signal-timing-pattern-inventory-item.phase-tp-list.phases
Step 23.1.2.16 IF TMDD_N93R1039_Vehicle_Red_Duration_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 23.1.2.16.1 VERIFY that element vehicle-red-duration exists within each instance of intersectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.intersection-signal-timing-pattern-inventory-item.phase-tp-list.phases
Step 23.1.2.17 IF TMDD_N93R1040_Minimum_Walk_Duration_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 23.1.2.17.1 VERIFY that element minimum-walk-duration exists within each instance of intersectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.intersection-signal-timing-pattern-inventory-item.phase-tp-list.phases
Step 23.1.2.18 IF TMDD_N93R1041_Pedestrian_Clearance_Duration_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 23.1.2.18.1 VERIFY that element pedestrian-clearance-duration exists within each instance of intersectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.intersection-signal-timing-pattern-inventory-item.phase-tp-list.phases
Step 23.1.2.19 IF TMDD_N93R1042_Steady_dont_walk_Duration_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 23.1.2.19.1 VERIFY that element steady-dont-walk-duration exists within each instance of intersectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.intersection-signal-timing-pattern-inventory-item.phase-tp-list.phases
Step 23.1.2.20 IF TMDD_N93R1043_Phase_Sequence_Information_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 23.1.2.20.1 VERIFY that element sequence-information exists within each instance of intersectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.intersection-signal-timing-pattern-inventory-item
Step 23.1.2.21 IF TMDD_N93R1044_Timing_Pattern_Inventory_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 23.1.2.21.1 VERIFY that element last-update-time exists within each instance of intersectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryMsg.intersection-signal-timing-pattern-inventory-item
Step 23.1.2.22 VERIFY that the values within the REQUEST message are correct per the TMDD standard and known operational conditions.

USER-VERIFY-MESSAGE.functionId: The User Verifies the message content

testStep.functionId: Step 23.1.2.23 CONFIGURE: Set OptionalContentVerified to True

Step 23.1.2.24 POSTCONDITION: PUBLICATION-EC-REPLY with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlIntersectionSignalTimingPatternInventoryUpdate RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED=TMDD_N93R1027_Publish_Signal_Timing_Pattern_Information_Parameter OPTIONALCONTENTVERIFIED = OptionalContentVerified PUBLICATIONRESPONSEMESSAGE = PublicationResponseMessage
